job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
Remote in Chicago / Other locations: Colorado, Austin, New York and California   About this Opportunity:   Our client is one of the best live streaming TV services focusing on Sports. They are rapidly growing and looking for a Sr Software Engineer to join their team.   About you     - Our client is looking for a hands-on Sr Software Engineer to take the lead in the team of talented software engineers   
  - Enjoys learning new things and sharing knowledge with coworkers   
  - Takes the initiative in identifying and removing roadblocks   
  - Enjoys working in a fast-moving environment in which individual contributors are trusted to make technical decisions and execute independently   
   What you will do     - This role will be responsible for day-to-day team operations including managing the team’s backlog and workload   
  - Coach and mentor the team, expanding their expertise   
  - Ensure that delivery teams are resourced and supported in order to meet the prioritized needs of the department   
  - Clearly communicate schedule and quality expectations and ensure that teams are operating efficiently   
  - Ensuring timely delivery on commitments and operational excellence   
  - Acting as a coach and mentor to junior members of the team   
  - Continuous collaboration with business stakeholders, product and other engineering teams on the team’s roadmap and deliverables   
  - Build and promote a work environment for high performance that is highly Agile, Collaborative and team centric   
  - Maintaining technical relationships with vendors that the team works closely with   
   What you will need     - 8 years of experience in delivering working software with at least 3 years building solutions for subscription-based services   
  - 3 years of experience leading a small engineering team   
  - Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology or a related field or equivalent as determined by a professional credentials evaluation.   
  - In-depth understanding of how subscriptions work - billing terms, renewals, cancellations, failed payments, etc. Ability to identify and cover edge cases.   
  - Good knowledge of web technologies and experience building transactional RESTful API services with 24x7 availability   
  - Master of at least one modern backend stack, with a willingness to learn new technologies and methodologies   
  - Have an interest or experience in Go, message queues, and service-oriented architectures
